title: Thresh Relic Shield Execute
body: The execute doesnt work for Thresh specifically

replies.body: The execute is for melee champions only. Thresh is ranged.
This is true. Most people don't read the items it makes me {{champion:32}} . Also this post has come up like 5x this week does no 1 search in these forums anymore :'(. Feelsboostedman.

Thresh is ranged. Execute ONLY works for melee.
And don't give me the "but he is melee if you're close" deal, he just has 3 animations for autos

What I don't understand is how enough people are trying out Thresh for the first time and don't understand that the relic shield execute doesn't work for him that I see this in the bug report section this often.  It isn't even a hidden interaction; all the information is available when you hover over the item.

{{item:3302}}  2 Gold Generation, 75 Health. UNIQUE Passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 195 (+5 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals you and the nearest allied champion for 20 Health and grants them kill gold. Allies who benefit from Spoils of War also gain +1 to their minions killed score. These effects require a nearby allied champion. Recharges every 40 seconds. Max 2 charges.

_**Melee basic attacks execute
Melee basic attacks execute
Melee basic attacks execute**_

Thresh is ranged.

It's unfortunate that it doesn't though. Thresh is one of the supports that regularly uses it, but it becomes far more stressful and tedious to properly use the item's passive for the heal/gold than with other tank supports.
